
copy-image
**********


DESCRIPTION
===========


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws ec2 copy-image
     --source-image-id <value>
     --source-region <value>
     --name <value>
     [--client-token <value>]
     [--description <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--source-image-id"  (string)

"--source-region"  (string)

"--name"  (string)


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--client-token"  (string)

"--description"  (string)
